scripts.start: npm run build:assets && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:assets && npm run build:scripts
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:git-merge && npm run build && npm run deploy:git-commit && npm run deploy:git-subtree-push
scripts.deploy:git-merge: git checkout gh-pages && git merge master -m 'Merge master'
scripts.deploy:git-subtree-push: cd .. && git subtree push --prefix examples/src/public origin gh-pages && git checkout master
